name: Binnacle Rails Showcase
description: Binnacle.io Examples for Ruby on Rails.

BINNACLE_ENDPOINT.description: One or more endpoints to communicate with the Binnacle service (api1.binnacle.io)

BINNACLE_API_KEY.description: The API key for an App publisher.

BINNACLE_API_SECRET.description: The API secret for an App publisher.

BINNACLE_APP_LOG_CTX.description: The Binnacle ID of the Rails Log Context.

BINNACLE_APP_ERR_CTX.description: The Binnacle ID of the Rails Error/Exceptions Context.

BINNACLE_CHAT_CTX.description: A context to be used to demo the Chat Widget.

BINNACLE_AR_CTX.description: A context to use to demo the ActiveRecord CUD Widget.

BINNACLE_VOTING_CTX.description: A context to use to demo Binnacle's Push Service.
